quest.name: The Qiqirn Strikes Back
objectives: Escort the kindly Qiqirn to the Specula Imperatoris entrance.
Pour cow bitter juice at the designated locations.

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: Me so sad. No one listen what I have to say. Why they think me a bad Qiqirn?

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: You will hear me? Oh, very happy to meet kindly adventurer!

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: There is a place me want to go. But lots of bad Qiqirn who stop me. Protect me, kindly adventurer!

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: Keep me nice and safe until reach Specula Imperatoris. Me want to explore it.

dialogue.name: SYTEM
dialogue.text: Escort the kindly Qiqirn safely to the Specula Imperatoris entrance. Should you fail to defend him, or move too far away, he will return to the Last Forest, where you may rendezvous with him before trying again.

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: Keep me nice and safe until reach Specula Imperatoris. Me want to explore it.

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Keep me nice and safe until reach Specula Imperatoris. Me want to explore it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have failed to successfully escort the kindly Qiqirn to Specula Imperatoris. Return to the Last Forest and speak with the kindly Qiqirn to begin once more.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have lost sight of the kindly Qiqirn. Retrace your steps to find them, then escort them safely to Specula Imperatoris.

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: (-Kindly Qiqirn-)Me going to search inside. Can ask kindly adventurer to do favor in the meantime?

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: Bad Qiqirn are scary. Me came up with plan to keep them away.

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: Pour this around. All Qiqirn hate this stinky smell. So stinky and smelly it is. Meet here again when done!

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: Found what me needed. Time to go home!

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: Thank you, kindly adventurer! Took back shiny shiny thing belonging to Qiqirn. Bad Qiqirn loot it and give loot to Empire.

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: Me sick of Empire! Always looting loot from Qiqirn.

dialogue.name: KIKIRUN02875
dialogue.text: But now it is Qiqirn's again. Here is reward for kindly adventurer!
